lore: Spacecats have only recently appeared in Siralim and other nations, and the Astral Spacecat is one of the most playful of them all. It's always seen with its beloved little ball, which it uses to show off amazing tricks! But what most don't realize is that the ball isn't just a toy â€” it's a sophisticated device that can read the emotions of any creature and transmit that information to its feline user.
menagerieDialog: (It's curled up in a floating ball, purring contentedly.)
Time to show these earthlings what a real predator looks like!
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Want to hear about them?
My space suit is impenetrable! Your puny weapons are no match for me!
(It's zooming around in erratic patterns, defying gravity.)
name: Astral Spacecat
